Welcome to L2Ghoul
Hello and welcome to our great new Champion project. We have worked hard on the server to be one of the largest. Enjoy playing on our server and if you have any suggestions, please visit our forum.
First steps
I think you're looking for things like Buffer, or maybe shop. Well, here you can use by clicking the 'From left' tab. And, you can also see rank, statistics, click the tabs above. I think that's all for now. *Good luck!*
Questions
Well, do you have any questions?, Use the buttons on the left to check information about the rates of server configuration, raids and instances, donations and more. If still confused, please visit our forums: www.L2Ghoul.com/forum
